resources.string: To send file to e-mail, navigate to: Listen recordings —> Your file. Click Mail and select your e-mail service.
To delete file, navigate to: Listen recordings —> Your file. Click Delete and select OK.
To change record type open the menu from top right and select settings. Select type you want to use and click OK!
To change language open the menu from top right and select settings. Select language you want to use and click OK!
To rename file, turn your phone to portrait orientation. Navigate to: Listen recordings —> Your file. Click the file name and give your file a new name.
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
